verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You answered God's call
obeyed his command
he sent you here
we know you're in his hands
Your message from the Word
touches our soul
We've seen your faithfulness
and we want you to know
Chorus
Pastor, we love you
We appreciate all your work for the Lord,
Repeat

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God sees the sacrifice
you've made for Jesus
and we know one day
you'll hear your Father say
"My child, well done, my child, I'm so proud of you"

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pastor, we love you
We appreciate all your work for the Lord,
Repeat

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
God sees the sacrifice
you've made for Jesus
you pray for the lost and God leads them to the cross
and we know one day
you'll hear your father say
"My child, well done, my child, I'm so proud of you"
